calculatedTags: _postal_code_properties=(() => { const f = overlapWith(feat)('postal_code_boundary'); if(f.length===0){return {};}; const p = f[0]?.feat?.properties; return {id:p.id, postal_code: p.postal_code, _closest_town_hall: p._closest_town_hall}; })()
